title: On-chan no Kyou wa Donna Kanji?

alternative_titles.ja: onちゃんのきょうはどんなかんじ？

synopsis:
On-chan no Kyou wa Donna Kanji? selects kanji related to Hokkaido that are compulsory for elementary school students in the lower grades, and aims to help with local education. On-chan, a popular mascot character of Hokkaido Television Broadcasting (HTB) that is loved by all generations, takes a single kanji character as a theme and freely imagines its meaning and shape, and performs a cute dance according to the stroke order.

(Source: Taiyo Kikaku, translated)
